description: The most practical guide to dealign with sexual harassment, this book covers all aspects of the problem -- from annnoying behavior to physical abuse. It describes what harassment is and details specific strategies to end it, including confronting the harasser, using a company complaint procedure, filign a state or federal sexual harassment claim and bringing a lawsuit. It also offers guidance to employers who want to create a policy against harassment and a procedure for handling complaints.
title: Sexual Harassment on the Job: What It Is & How to Stop It
